mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, A.* from `article` A where (@rownum:=0)=0 AND board_id=0 order by A.article_id desc;
select article_id, article_title, article_content, article_date, article_image from `article` where article_id=#{value}
mapper.update: update `article` set article_title=#{article_title} , article_content=#{article_content}, article_image=#{article_image} where article_id=#{article_id}
